name: Void Destroyer
blurb: Have you ever wanted to be the pilot and the commander? A space combat simulator and real time strategy hybrid.

rewards.reward: No Reward

Commentator: \r\n\r\nSpend a buck then post a comment. I'll read it, we'll talk and maybe we'll become life long friends. Hey not a bad way to spend a buck, plus you get to keep up with the project's updates.

Well wisher : 

Thank you for supporting the project! I appreciate your support.




----------------------------------------------



All reward levels $5 and over - as suggested by a backer - every backer gets a name and callsign (if desired) added to a list - names will be chosen at random from that list to appear as pilots/captains of ships in game. Names and callsigns subject to approval. If multiple copies of game then multiple names added. Names/Callsigns will be hard coded into the executable where they will live and be reborn countless of times.
Early Backer: \r\n\r\nA thank you for backing early. You get the game (digital download) when it is released.
Kind of Early Backer - you missed the $10 bracket, but I got your back. Its not the end of the world. Spend a few bucks more than the early birds to get the game (digital download) on release.
Backer: \r\n\r\nGet a copy (digital download) on release.
Best Friend Backer: You and a friend get the game (digital download) on release. When your friend doesn't call you because he's playing... don't blame me.

Early Beta Backer: 

Limited early beta slot. You get the "in development" version while in Beta and you get a copy on release. Being a Beta tester means you can be more involved in the project while in development.



Beta to follow shortly after end of Kickstarter campaign.
Kind of Early Beta Backer - $20 bracket is full - so we made room for you in the $22. We'll see you in the Beta plus you get the game on release.

Beta Backer: 
You get the "in development" version while in Beta and you get the game on release. Being in the Beta means you can be more involved in the project while in development.

Beta to follow shortly after end of Kickstarter campaign.

Beta Backer + 1: 

You get the "in development" version while in Beta and you and a friend get the game on release. Being a Beta tester means you can be more involved in the project while in development. This level is for those wanting to back a bit more than the Beta Backer while getting something in return.

Beta to follow shortly after end of Kickstarter campaign.

Bundle Buddy Beta Backer: You and a friend get the "in development" version while in Beta and the game on release. Being a Beta tester means the both of you can be more involved in the project while in development. Beta to follow shortly after end of Kickstarter campaign.
Character Name: \r\nRights to name an in game story related character. Plus everything in the Beta Backer level. Names subject to approval.

Ship Name: \r\nRights to name a ship plus everything in the Beta Backer level. I've named a few ships in game after friends and there's also a ship flying around named after my first car. You can name a ship after someone you love and have it fly among the stars. Names subject to approval - from an available list of ships. If name is short or can be abbreviated - ship decals/markings are possible.

Tagger: Tag an asteroid (large and unique) with a short phrase or initials. Decals are also possible.


Examples: 

P + E and a heart symbol
Paul was here
Decal or logo
AJR 2012

Subject to approval. 

Also includes everything in the Beta Backer level.

Candy Backer - I buy a bunch of candy (aprox $25 worth) and ship them to you. Various favorites of mine that I grew up with - Polish and chocolate based. Plus everything in the Beta Backer level. Enjoy the candy while playing the game to get a glimpse at the "Paul" experience.

Base Name: Rights to name a base plus everything in the Beta Backer level.  Bases are hubs of activity, they are both places of rest and conflict. Name a very memorable and special in game element.  Names subject to approval - from an available list of bases. If name is short or can be abbreviated - decals/markings are possible.

Character Likeness:\r\nRights to define the visual appearance (2D portrait) of a in game character as well as naming rights. It can be drawn to resemble you, someone else or your imagination. Plus everything in the Beta Backer level. Name and appearance subject to approval.

Ship Designer: \r\nHelp design a ship - fitting into the current game universe. Name it, give it a purpose/role, weapons load out (if any), define the stats and the overall look.  Designs and names subject to approval. Plus everything in the Beta Backer level.

Side Quest: Together we will design an optional side quest in the story mode portion of the game. Including a map, objectives, triggers and dialog. Includes one (optional) character portrait based on your specs (see other character portrait reward for more details). Some ideas/examples: it could lead to a discovery of a new ship (unique [a lost fleet member] or build able) which you'll help design and get naming rights to if you so chose.  Maybe it will lead to the discovery of a new build able platform?


We'll enhance the game together, provide a challenge to the player and give a worthy reward for completion. Design aspects subject to approval. Contact me if you have any questions.

This also includes everything in the Beta Backer level.

Evil Boss Man Backer: Like the Character Likeness bracket - but this is the boss. You get a chance to name, design and setup a back story and motivation - subject to approval. Plus everything in the Beta Backer bracket.
